name: Bronco Billy
summary_text: An idealistic, modern-day cowboy struggles to keep his Wild West show afloat in the face of hard luck and waning interest.

name: Tokyo Gore Police
summary_text: In future Tokyo, a young woman in the privatized police force tracks down her father's killer while battling against mutant rebels known as engineers.

name: Silk
summary_text: The story of a married silkworm merchant-turned-smuggler in 19th century France traveling to Japan for his town's supply of silkworms after a disease wipes out their African supply. During his stay in Japan, he becomes obsessed with the concubine of a local baron.

name: People I Know
summary_text: A New York press agent must scramble when his major client becomes embroiled in a huge scandal.

name: Gorgeous
summary_text: A romantic girl travels to Hong Kong in search of certain love but instead meets a kind-hearted professional fighter for whom she begins to fall instead.

name: The Palm Beach Story
summary_text: An inventor needs cash to develop his big idea, so his adoring wife decides to raise it by divorcing him and marrying a millionaire.

name: Eternity and a Day
summary_text: Famous writer Alexander is very ill and has little time left to live. He meets a little boy on the street, who is an illegal immigrant from Albania, and goes on a journey with him to take the boy home.

name: Germany Year Zero
summary_text: A young German boy faces the problems of the tough life in the immediate post WWII Berlin.

name: The Flock
summary_text: This film is about a hyper-vigilant employee of the department of public safety who, while training his young female replacement, has to track down a missing girl who he is convinced is connected to a paroled sex offender he is investigating.

name: Please Give
summary_text: In New York City, a husband and wife butt heads with the granddaughters of the elderly woman who lives in the apartment the couple owns.

name: The Woods
summary_text: Set in 1965 New England, a troubled girl encounters mysterious happenings in the woods surrounding an isolated girls school that she was sent to by her disinterested parents.

name: The Private Life of Sherlock Holmes
summary_text: When a bored Holmes eagerly takes the case of Gabrielle Valladon after an attempt on her life, the search for her missing husband leads to Loch Ness and the legendary monster.

name: The Phantom Carriage
summary_text: On New Year's Eve, the driver of a ghostly carriage forces a drunken man to reflect on his selfish, wasted life.

name: The Portrait of a Lady
summary_text: An American girl inherits a fortune and falls into a misguided relationship with a gentleman confidence artist whose true nature, including a barbed and covetous disposition, turns her life into a nightmare.

name: Geetha Govindam
summary_text: An innocent young lecturer is misunderstood as a pervert and despised by a woman who co-incidentally turns out to be the younger sister of his brother-in-law. Eventually differences subside and love blooms between them.

name: C.H.U.D.
summary_text: A bizarre series of sudden disappearances on the streets of New York City seems to point toward something unsavory living in the sewers.

name: Santa Claus Conquers the Martians
summary_text: The Martians kidnap Santa Claus because there is nobody on Mars to give their children presents.

name: Poetry
summary_text: A sixty-something woman, faced with the discovery of a heinous family crime and in the early stages of Alzheimer's disease, finds strength and purpose when she enrolls in a poetry class.

name: The Babysitters
summary_text: A teenager turns her babysitting service into a call-girl service for married guys after fooling around with one of her customers.

name: Apartment 143
summary_text: A team of parapsychologists try to figure out a strange phenomenon occurring in an apartment building.

name: Ladies in Lavender
summary_text: Two sisters befriend a mysterious foreigner who washes up on the beach of their 1930s Cornish seaside village.

name: StreetDance 3D
summary_text: In order to win the Street Dance Championships, a dance crew is forced to work with ballet dancers from the Royal Dance School in exchange for rehearsal space.

name: Vivegam
summary_text: An Interpol agent betrayed by his friends sets out to take revenge against the friends who work for a secret agency.

name: Matador
summary_text: A matador is wounded by a bull and can no longer kill in the arena. It just a one flaw besides many others from several characters whom unsuspected collide.

name: 12 Feet Deep
summary_text: Two sisters are trapped under the fiberglass cover of an Olympic sized public pool and must brave the cold and each other to survive the harrowing night.

name: The Shape of Things
summary_text: A quiet, unassuming man begins to change in a major way as a result of meeting a new, art-student girlfriend, and his friends are unsettled by the transformation.

name: 42nd Street
summary_text: When the leading lady of a Broadway musical breaks her ankle, she is replaced by a young unknown actress, who becomes the star of the show.

name: United
summary_text: Based on the true story of Manchester United's legendary "Busby Babes", the youngest side ever to win the Football League and the 1958 Munich Air Crash that claimed eight of their number.

name: Labor Pains
summary_text: A young woman pretends to be pregnant in order to avoid being fired from her job. When that gets her special treatment by everyone involved in her life, she tries to keep up the lie for nine months.

name: D.O.A.
summary_text: Frank Bigelow, told he's been poisoned and has only a few days to live, tries to find out who killed him and why.

name: Space Chimps
summary_text: Three chimps are sent into space to explore the possibility of alien life when an unmanned space shuttle crash lands on an uncharted planet.

name: De-Lovely
summary_text: Inspecting a magical biographical stage musical, composer Cole Porter reviews his life and career with his wife, Linda.

name: A Family Man
summary_text: A headhunter whose life revolves around closing deals in a survival-of-the-fittest boiler room, battles his top rival for control of their job placement company -- his dream of owning the company clashing with the needs of his family.

name: Hichki
summary_text: Hichki presents a positive and inspiring story about a woman who turns her biggest weakness into her biggest strength.

name: The Crow: Salvation
summary_text: Alex Corvis returns to the world of the living to solve the murder of a young woman that he was wrongly accused of.

name: Syrup
summary_text: A slacker hatches a million-dollar idea. But, in order to see it through, he has to learn to trust his attractive corporate counterpart. Based on Max Barry's novel.

name: Wake in Fright
summary_text: After a bad gambling bet, a schoolteacher is marooned in a town full of crazy, drunk, violent men who threaten to make him just as crazy, drunk, and violent.

name: Paid in Full
summary_text: A young man from Harlem, forced to cope with the 1980s drug scene, builds an illegal empire, only to have a crisis of conscience.

name: Lammbock
summary_text: Stefan and Kai have good going business, self-grown cannabis screened as pizza delivering service. For now they only have to deal with aphids.

name: Ghulam
summary_text: An amateur boxer runs errands for a local gangster but revolts against him after the gangster kills his friend and his conscience is awakened.

name: Hush
summary_text: A couple with jobs and apartment in NYC, decide to move to his mom's farm, get married and have the baby there. They can also make the changes to get a better price for the farm. However, there's something seriously wrong with his mom.

name: Astérix chez les Bretons
summary_text: The diminutive Asterix and his rather larger companion Obelix, warriors of the last village in Gaul still free after the Roman invasion, set out on a mission to deliver a barrel of their ...                See full summary »

name: Alligator
summary_text: A baby alligator is flushed down a Chicago toilet and survives by eating discarded laboratory rats injected with growth hormones. The small reptile grows gigantic, escapes the city sewers, and goes on a rampage.

name: Bitva za Sevastopol
summary_text: A story of Lyudmila Pavlichenko, the most successful female sniper in history.

name: Pink Cadillac
summary_text: Skip tracer Tommy looks for bail-jumper Lou Ann. Her crime is marrying Roy, who left counterfeit money in their mobile home and got her arrested. She leaves Roy in his pink Cadillac full of money. His psycho friends want their money back.

name: Ernest Goes to Camp
summary_text: Ernest, a lovable loser who works as a summer camp handyman and dreams of becoming a guidance councilor, must find a way to inspire a group of juvenile delinquents as well as stop a shady strip mining company from closing the camp.

name: The Decoy Bride
summary_text: When the world's media descend on the remote Scottish island where a Hollywood actress is attempting to get married, a local girl is hired as a decoy bride to put the paparazzi off the scent.

name: Berserk: The Golden Age Arc I - The Egg of the King
summary_text: He trusts no one, only his sword.

name: Billu
summary_text: In an Indian village, a struggling barber sees his luck begin to turn when residents learn that a famous actor he once knew is coming to town.

name: The Age of Spin: Dave Chappelle Live at the Hollywood Palladium
summary_text: Dave Chappelle gives his usual skewed insight into the topics of race, technology, OJ Simpson, and more in a stand up special filmed in Hollywood.

name: Clay Pigeons
summary_text: After hearing that his wife sleeps with Clay, Earl kills himself, making it look like Clay shot him. The widow doesn't like it when Clay starts sees another woman instead. Bodies start piling up.

name: Secret of the Wings
summary_text: Tinkerbell wanders into the forbidden Winter woods and meets Periwinkle. Together they learn the secret of their wings and try to unite the warm fairies and the winter fairies to help Pixie Hollow.

name: Fifty Dead Men Walking
summary_text: Martin McGartland joins the I.R.A. and feeds information to Britain's Special Branch Agent Fergus.

name: Three Fugitives
summary_text: A reformed bank robber is taken hostage by a desperate man during a bank hold up, but is forced to go on the run with his captor when they're both mistakenly thought to be in cahoots.

name: Turbulence
summary_text: After a shootout on a flight transporting prisoners, a flight attendant must outwit a smooth-talking serial killer and land the plane herself.

name: Theeran Adhigaram Ondru
summary_text: Theeran, a police officer, is entrusted with the task to solve the mystery behind a series of murders. The only clue left behind is that all the murders are committed in the same pattern.

name: An Inspector Calls
summary_text: A mysterious Inspector investigates the wealthy Birling family and their dinner guests following the suicide of a young woman.

name: The Most Dangerous Game
summary_text: A psychotic big game hunter deliberately strands a luxury yacht on a remote island, where he begins to hunt its passengers for sport.

name: God's Pocket
summary_text: A blue collar worker tries to cover things up when his stepson is killed in a suspicious accident, but a local reporter senses that something's amiss.

name: The Adventures of Milo and Otis
summary_text: The adventures of a young cat and a dog as they find themselves accidentally separated and each swept into a hazardous trek.

name: My Way
summary_text: In World War II-era Korea, rival runners, one Korean (Jang Dong-gun) and one Japanese (Joe Odagiri), go to war together against the Soviets.

name: The Fury of a Patient Man
summary_text: A hard-working single mother and wife of a getaway driver who is about to be released is approached by an unassuming and gentle man, completely unaware though of his inscrutable and utterly impelling motives.

name: Murder Party
summary_text: A random invitation to a Halloween party leads a man into the hands of a rogue collective intent on murdering him for the sake of their art, sparking a bloodbath of mishap, mayhem and hilarity.

name: Ashes and Diamonds
summary_text: As WWII and the German occupation ends, the Polish resistance and the Russian forces turn on each other in an attempt to take over leadership in Communist Poland.

name: Ruang rak noi nid mahasan
summary_text: A suicidal, obsessively compulsive Japanese librarian is forced to lie low in Thailand with a pot-smoking woman coping with the recent loss of her sister.

name: Tristana
summary_text: Shortly after her mother's death, an innocent and youthful woman will find refuge into the household of her middle-aged aristocratic guardian, who will submit her to his sexual advances.

name: How to Make an American Quilt
summary_text: Bride-to-be Finn Dodd hears tales of romance and sorrow from her elders as they construct a quilt.

name: Brothers
summary_text: Two brothers must negotiate changing roles and shifting family dynamics when one is sent to war in Afghanistan.

name: Monkey Shines
summary_text: A quadriplegic man has a trained monkey help him with his paralysis, until the little monkey begins to develop feelings, and rage, against its new master.

name: Hwal
summary_text: On a fishing boat at sea, a 60-year old man has been raising a girl since she was a baby. It is agreed that they will get married on her 17th birthday, and she is 16 now. They live a quiet and secluded life, renting the boat to day fishermen and practicing strange divination rites. Their life changes when a teenage student comes aboard...

name: Monsieur Ibrahim
summary_text: In Paris, a Turkish shop owner befriends a Jewish boy in his mid-teens.

name: Trapped
summary_text: A man struggles to survive after he unintentionally locks himself up in a high rise devoid of food, water and electricity.

name: Doua lozuri
summary_text: Three men from a provincial town are in urgent need of money and decide to buy a lottery ticket. They win the lottery, but soon after their ticket gets stolen.

name: Violent Cop
summary_text: A violence prone police officer discovers that his colleague is trafficking drugs.

name: Transit
summary_text: A gang of bank robbers hide their loot in the car of a family going camping. They chase down the family to kill them and get the loot back, but run into a fight.

name: My Life
summary_text: A terminally ill man prepares for his death.

name: Bus Stop
summary_text: A naive but stubborn cowboy falls in love with a saloon singer and tries to take her away against her will to get married and live on his ranch in Montana.

name: Savage Grace
summary_text: A dramatization of the shocking Barbara Daly Baekeland murder case, which happened in a posh London flat on Friday 17 November 1972. The bloody crime caused a stir on both sides of the Atlantic and remains one of the most memorable American Tragedies...

name: The NeverEnding Story III
summary_text: A young boy must restore order when a group of bullies steal the magical book that acts as a portal between Earth and the imaginary world of Fantasia.

name: The Cameraman
summary_text: Hopelessly in love with a woman working at MGM Studios, a clumsy man attempts to become a motion picture cameraman to be close to the object of his desire.

name: The Night of the Iguana
summary_text: A defrocked Episcopal clergyman leads a bus-load of middle-aged Baptist women on a tour of the Mexican coast and comes to terms with the failure haunting his life.

name: Starship Troopers: Invasion
summary_text: A black op has gone terribly wrong. Now, Captain Carmen Ibanez and a hardcore trooper famed as Major Henry "Hero" Varro must lead a team of battle-weary troopers to find the missing ship and discover what went wrong.

name: Peacock
summary_text: A train accident in rural Nebraska gradually unveils a mystery involving the town's bank clerk.

name: Lust for Life
summary_text: The life of brilliant but tortured artist Vincent van Gogh.

name: Sex and Death 101
summary_text: A guy's life is turned around by an email, which includes the names of everyone he's had sex with and ever will have sex with. His situation gets worse when he encounters a femme fatale (Ryder) who targets men guilty of sex crime.

name: Snake in the Eagle's Shadow
summary_text: An orphan who has been raised at a kung fu school, where he is treated as little more than a dogsbody and practice target for the students, has a life-changing experience after helping an old peripatetic beggar.

name: The Next Best Thing
summary_text: Abbie, tired of failed relationships, has a one-night-stand with her gay friend; they agree to raise the resulting baby together.

name: Karthik Calling Karthik
summary_text: A much abused loner achieves success, and even wins the heart of his gorgeous co-worker, after getting early morning mysterious phone calls from someone.

name: The Falcon and the Snowman
summary_text: The true story of a disillusioned military contractor employee and his drug pusher childhood friend who became walk-in spies for the Soviet Union.

name: The Chase
summary_text: The escape of Bubber Reeves from prison affects the inhabitants of a small Southern town.

name: No Entry
summary_text: Kishan and Sunny's life are troubled after their womanizing friend Prem sets them up with a hooker named Bobby, leading to web of lies and confusions.

name: Facing Windows
summary_text: Overburdened and stuck in a greying marriage, Giovanna takes to caring for the Jewish Holocaust survivor her husband brings home. As she begins to reflect on her life, she turns to the man who lives across from her ...

name: Bamboozled
summary_text: A frustrated African-American TV writer proposes a blackface minstrel show in protest, but to his chagrin it becomes a hit.

name: Desperation
summary_text: When a sheriff arrests a writer, a family, a couple, and a hitchiker and throws them in a jail cell in the deserted town of Desperation, they must fight for their lives.

name: Chances Are
summary_text: A reincarnated man unknowingly falls in love with his own daughter from his previous life. Once he realizes this, he tries to end their relationship before angels erase his memory.

name: Charlotte Gray
summary_text: A young Scottish woman joins the French Resistance during World War II to rescue her Royal Air Force boyfriend who is lost in France.

name: The Man Who Killed Hitler and Then the Bigfoot
summary_text: A legendary American war veteran is recruited to hunt a mythical creature.

name: Stay Tuned
summary_text: A husband and wife are sucked into a hellish television set and have to survive a gauntlet of twisted versions of shows they find themselves in.

name: The Raven
summary_text: A magician, who has been turned into a raven, turns to a former sorcerer for help.

name: Ernest Scared Stupid
summary_text: Ernest accidentally unleashes an ugly troll that plots to transform children into wooden dolls in the town of Briarville, Missouri.

name: Walking with Dinosaurs 3D
summary_text: See and feel what it was like when dinosaurs ruled the Earth, in a story where an underdog dino triumphs to become a hero for the ages.

name: Me and Orson Welles
summary_text: In 1937, a teenager is cast in the Mercury Theatre production of "Julius Caesar", directed by a young Orson Welles.

name: Mixed Nuts
summary_text: The events focus around a crisis hotline business on one crazy night during the Christmas holidays.

name: Orca
summary_text: A hunter squares off against a killer whale seeking vengeance for the death of its mate.

name: ATL
summary_text: As four friends prepare for life after high school, different challenges bring about turning points in each of their lives. The dramas unfold and resolve at their local rollerskating rink, Cascade.

name: Rob the Mob
summary_text: A Queens couple who specialize in robbing mafia social clubs stumble upon a score bigger than they could ever imagine, becoming targets of both the mob and the FBI in the process.

name: Candyman: Farewell to the Flesh
summary_text: The Candyman arrives in New Orleans and sets his sights on a young woman whose family was ruined by the immortal killer years before.

name: Wizards
summary_text: On a post-apocalyptic Earth, a wizard and his faire folk comrades fight an evil wizard who's using technology in his bid for conquest.

name: Drunken Angel
summary_text: A drunken doctor with a hot temper and a violence-prone gangster with tuberculosis form a quicksilver bond.

name: Below Her Mouth
summary_text: An unexpected affair quickly escalates into a heart-stopping reality for two women whose passionate connection changes their lives forever.

name: Armed and Dangerous
summary_text: A fired cop and useless lawyer sign up as security guards and find they've joined a corrupt union.

name: Sherlock Gnomes
summary_text: Garden gnomes, Gnomeo (James McAvoy) and Juliet (Emily Blunt), recruit renowned detective Sherlock Gnomes (Johnny Depp) to investigate the mysterious disappearance of other garden ornaments.

name: Yip Man: Jung gik yat zin
summary_text: In postwar Hong Kong, legendary Wing Chun grandmaster Ip Man is reluctantly called into action once more, when what begin as simple challenges from rival kung fu styles soon draw him into ...                See full summary »

name: Fat Girl
summary_text: Two sisters confront their sexual attitudes and experiences while on a family holiday.

name: Maine Pyar Kiya
summary_text: After Suman's father leaves her in the care of another family while he travels abroad, she falls in love with Prem. However, in order to for them to marry, Prem has to prove to Suman's father that he is not the same as his own dad.

name: Going My Way
summary_text: When young Father O'Malley arrives at St. Dominic's, old Father Fitzgibbon doesn't think much of the church's newest member.

name: Aamir
summary_text: A doctor of Indian origin returning to Mumbai from London is forced to participate in a terrorist plot.

name: Brainscan
summary_text: A teenager is part of an interactive video game where he kills innocent victims. Later, the murders become real.

name: Teen Wolf Too
summary_text: Todd Howard is a struggling teenager. Nothing seems to be going very well for him, until he turns into a wolf.

name: Acts of Vengeance
summary_text: A fast-talking lawyer transforms his body and takes a vow of silence, not to be broken until he finds out who killed his wife and daughter and has his revenge.

name: The Night Eats the World
summary_text: The morning after a party, a young man wakes up to find Paris invaded by zombies.

name: Deathwatch
summary_text: In the middle of World War I, nine British soldiers caught behind enemy lines seek refuge in a complex network of German trenches. What they soon discover is that they aren't alone - and it isn't a German soldier that's hunting them down.

name: A-X-L
summary_text: A.X.L. is a top-secret, robotic dog who develops a special friendship with Miles and will go to any length to protect his new companion.

name: Dabangg 3
summary_text: Chulbul Pandey encounters an enemy from his past, and his origin story as the fearless cop unfolds.

name: Crime Busters
summary_text: An attempted robbery turns to be an unexpected recruitment when two unemployed men mistakenly break into a police office instead of a store.

name: Mohenjo Daro
summary_text: In 2016 BC, a kind farmer leads an uprising in the city of Mohenjo Daro.

name: The Hot Spot
summary_text: Upon arriving to a small town, a drifter quickly gets into trouble with the local authorities - and the local women - after he robs a bank.

name: DeepStar Six
summary_text: A team of navy personnel stationed at a temporary base at the bottom of the ocean and tasked with setting up nuclear missiles discovers a huge underwater cavern which houses a giant prehistoric creature.

name: Twilight
summary_text: A retired detective accepts a simple task, unaware that it will tear open old, forgotten, but deadly wounds.

name: A Good Marriage
summary_text: After 25 years of a good marriage, what will Darcy do once she discovers her husband's sinister secret?

name: Spare Parts
summary_text: Four Hispanic high school students form a robotics club. With no experience, 800 bucks, used car parts and a dream, this rag tag team goes up against the country's reigning robotics champion, MIT.

name: Black Sabbath
summary_text: Boris Karloff hosts a trio of horror stories concerning a stalked call girl, a vampire-like monster who preys on his family, and a nurse who is haunted by her ring's rightful owner.

name: Alps
summary_text: A group of people start a business where they impersonate the recently deceased in order to help their clients through the grieving process.

name: Forsaken
summary_text: In 1872, an embittered gunslinger named John Henry Clayton attempts to make amends with his estranged father Reverend Samuel Clayton while their community is besieged by ruthless land-grabbers.

name: Comidark Films 2: The Pawn
summary_text: Metin Arici who has been working as a staff for a ferry in Istanbul for a long time, also has been living in the same vehicle for 6 years. An interviewer visits them one day to evaluate how...                See full summary »

name: Chéri
summary_text: The son of a courtesan retreats into a fantasy world after being forced to end his relationship with the older woman who educated him in the ways of love.

name: Novocaine
summary_text: A dentist finds himself a murder suspect after a sexy patient seduces him & steals all of the drugs from his practice.

name: Une vie de chat
summary_text: In Paris, a cat who lives a secret life as a cat burglar's aide must come to the rescue of Zoe, the little girl he lives with, after she falls into a gangster's clutches.

name: Les émotifs anonymes
summary_text: What happens when a man and a woman share a common passion? They fall in love. And this is what happens to Jean-René, the boss of a small chocolate factory, and Angélique, a gifted ...                See full summary »

name: Fullmetal Alchemist the Movie: Conqueror of Shamballa
summary_text: Edward Elric, an alchemist from an alternate world, races to prevent the Thule Society from harnessing alchemy to wage war on his home.

name: Willow Creek
summary_text: A man and his girlfriend camp in the woods to capture firsthand evidence of Bigfoot.

name: Birds of Passage
summary_text: During the marijuana bonanza, a violent decade that saw the origins of drug trafficking in Colombia, Rapayet and his indigenous family get involved in a war to control the business that ends up destroying their lives and their culture.

name: Pawn Shop Chronicles
summary_text: An anthology of stories involving meth addicted white supremacists, a man looking for his kidnapped wife and an Elvis impersonator.

name: Gentlemen of Fortune
summary_text: It so happens that peaceful kindergarten teacher is incredibly similar to the terrible villain who stole the helmet of Alexander the Great. And villain's accomplices are unexpectedly similar to children - they also need love and care.

name: Daisies
summary_text: After realizing that all world is spoiled, Marie and Marie are committed to be spoiled themselves. They rip off older men, feast in lavish meals and do all kinds of mischief. But what is all this leading to?

name: The Warrior
summary_text: 1375. Nine Koryo warriors, envoys exiled by Imperial China, battle to protect a Chinese Ming Princess from Mongolian troops.

name: Hannah Arendt
summary_text: A look at the life of philosopher and political theorist Hannah Arendt, who reported for 'The New Yorker' on the trial of the Nazi leader Adolf Eichmann in Jerusalem.

name: Delta Farce
summary_text: Three bumbling Army reservists bound for Iraq are accidentally dropped at Mexican village besieged by hostile forces.

name: Dominion
summary_text: Years before Father Lankester Merrin helped save Regan MacNeil's soul, he first encounters the demon Pazuzu in East Africa. Merrin's initial battle with Pazuzu leads to the rediscovery of his faith.

name: Places in the Heart
summary_text: In central Texas in the 1930s, a widow, with two small children, tries to run her small 40-acre farm with the help of two disparate people.

name: Extreme Movie
summary_text: A sketch comedy movie about the joys and embarrassments of teen sex. But mostly the embarrassments.

name: Surviving the Game
summary_text: A homeless man is hired as a survival guide for a group of wealthy businessmen on a hunting trip in the mountains, unaware that they are killers who hunt humans for sport, and that he is their new prey.

name: Balkanski spijun
summary_text: Convinced that his subtenant is a spy and an enemy of the state, a man falls into deep paranoia which leads to absurd and destructive chain of events.

name: Hoodlum
summary_text: Black gangsters in 1930 Harlem fights Dutch Schultz who is trying to horn in on their numbers racket.

name: Voice from the Stone
summary_text: Set in 1950s Tuscany, Voice from the Stone is the haunting and suspenseful story of Verena, a solemn nurse drawn to aid a young boy who has fallen silent since the sudden passing of his mother.

name: Chi trova un amico trova un tesoro
summary_text: On a small pacific island, Alan and Charlie try to find a war treasure left behind by the Japanese army in World War II.

name: Black '47
summary_text: Set in Ireland during the Great Famine, the drama follows an Irish Ranger who has been fighting for the British Army abroad, as he abandons his post to reunite with his family.

name: Because of Winn-Dixie
summary_text: A mischievous dog befriends a lonely young girl in a new town and helps her make new friends.

name: Madea's Family Reunion
summary_text: While planning her family reunion, a pistol-packing grandma must contend with the other dramas on her plate, including the runaway who has been placed under her care, and her love-troubled nieces.

name: 3 Ninjas: High Noon at Mega Mountain
summary_text: The three unstoppable Ninja brothers fight to save their hero (Hulk Hogan) and Mega Mountain Amusement Park from the vicious kid-hating Medusa (Loni Anderson).

name: The Conspiracy
summary_text: A documentary about conspiracy theories takes a horrific turn after the filmmakers uncover an ancient and dangerous secret society.

name: The Little Foxes
summary_text: The ruthless, moneyed Hubbard clan lives in, and poisons, their part of the deep South at the turn of the twentieth century.

name: The Factory
summary_text: An obsessed cop is on the trail of a serial killer prowling the streets of Buffalo, N.Y. but when his teenage daughter disappears, he drops any professional restraint to get the killer.

name: Kickboxer: Vengeance
summary_text: A kick boxer is out to avenge his brother.

name: Di renjie: Tong tian di guo
summary_text: An exiled detective is recruited to solve a series of mysterious deaths that threaten to delay the inauguration of Empress Wu.

name: River of No Return
summary_text: The titular river unites a farmer recently released from prison, his young son, and an ambitious saloon singer. In order to survive, each must be purged of anger, and each must learn to understand and care for the others.

name: I Come in Peace
summary_text: A Renegade Cop is forced to work with an FBI Agent in order to bring down a group of Drug Dealers with sinister plans.

name: Mouchette
summary_text: A young girl living in the French countryside suffers constant indignities at the hand of alcoholism and her fellow man.

name: G.B.F.
summary_text: What happens after Tanner is outed by his classmates and becomes the title "gay best friend" for three high school queen bees?

name: Bait
summary_text: An ex-con is used by police to lure a criminal out of hiding.

name: Ginger & Rosa
summary_text: A look at the lives of two teenage girls - inseparable friends Ginger and Rosa -- growing up in 1960s London as the Cuban Missile Crisis looms, and the pivotal event that comes to redefine their relationship.

name: Donkey Punch
summary_text: Things go drastically wrong for a group of British holidaymakers in Spain.

name: A Pure Formality
summary_text: Onoff is a famous writer who hasn't published any new books for quite some time and has become a recluse. When he is picked up by the police one stormy night, without any identification, ...                See full summary »

name: Hounds of Love
summary_text: Vicki Maloney is randomly abducted from a suburban street by a disturbed couple. As she observes the dynamic between her captors she quickly realises she must drive a wedge between them if she is to survive.

name: Kedarnath
summary_text: Mansoor, a reserved and reticent Pithoo, helps pilgrims make an arduous journey upwards to the temple town. His world turns around when he meets the beautiful and rebellious Mukku who draws him into a whirlwind of intense love.

name: Badrinath Ki Dulhania
summary_text: Badrinath is looking for a typical bride; Vaidehi is looking for an independent life. Together they must break with tradition and redefine their role.

name: Fukrey
summary_text: The paths of four dream-chasing college friends cross with an array of colourful characters, from a tough-talking Punjabi female don to a Jugaad Baaz college watchman. Mayhem ensues.

name: Bushwick
summary_text: When a U.S. based military force invades their Brooklyn neighborhood, 20-year-old Lucy and war veteran Stupe must depend on each other to survive.

name: Alexander Nevsky
summary_text: The story of how a great Russian prince led a ragtag army to battle an invading force of Teutonic Knights.

name: Sleepaway Camp II: Unhappy Campers
summary_text: Angela, supposedly reformed and living under an assumed surname, is working at a summer camp. However, when the campers start misbehaving, she soon reverts to her old ways.

name: Shadows
summary_text: Cassavetes' jazz-scored improvisational film explores interracial friendships and relationships in Beat-Era (1950s) New York City.

name: Bleach
summary_text: A Japanese teenager with the ability to see ghosts gains a soul reaper's powers and begins his duties as a substitute soul reaper.

name: Jenny's Wedding
summary_text: Jenny's parents and siblings are always trying to set her up with a man when she visits them. What they don't know is that she's already met the right person, her "roommate" Kitty, 5 years ago and she wants to marry her and start a family.

name: The Revenant
summary_text: In Los Angeles, a fallen soldier who has joined the ranks of the living dead reunites with his best friend in order to deal with the city's drug dealers and killers - a perfect way to collect the blood that one of them so desperately needs.

name: The Flower of My Secret
summary_text: Leo writes trashy romance novels under a pseudonym but as she struggles in her relationship with her husband, she finds her output becoming darker.

name: A Touch of Sin
summary_text: Four independent stories set in modern China about random acts of violence.

name: Neredesin Firuze
summary_text: The tragicomic story of a young man who wants to be a famous singer

name: Elmer Gantry
summary_text: A fast-talking traveling salesman with a charming, loquacious manner convinces a sincere evangelist that he can be an effective preacher for her cause.

name: Double Lover
summary_text: Chloé, a fragile young woman, falls in love with her psychoanalyst, Paul. A few months later she moves in with him, but soon discovers that her lover is concealing a part of his identity.

name: The Gingerbread Man
summary_text: A lawyer uses his power to help his lover put her father behind bars, but when he escapes, they are all in danger.

name: My Father the Hero
summary_text: A teenage girl on vacation in the Bahamas with her divorced father tries to impress a potential boyfriend by saying that her father is actually her lover.

name: The Lodger: A Story of the London Fog
summary_text: A landlady suspects her new lodger is the madman killing women in London.

name: The Courier
summary_text: Cold War spy Greville Wynne and his Russian source try to put an end to the Cuban Missile Crisis.

name: Norma Rae
summary_text: A young single mother and textile worker agrees to help unionize her mill despite the problems and dangers involved.

name: Super Deluxe
summary_text: An unfaithful newly-wed wife, an estranged father, a priest and an angry son suddenly find themselves in the most unexpected predicaments, each poised to experience their destiny, all on one fateful day.

name: Driving Lessons
summary_text: A coming of age story about a shy teenage boy trying to escape from the influence of his domineering mother. His world changes when he begins to work for a retired actress.

name: The D Train
summary_text: The head of a high school reunion committee tries to get the most popular guy in school to attend their class' upcoming 20-year reunion.

name: Julius Caesar
summary_text: The growing ambition of Julius Caesar is a source of major concern to his close friend Brutus. Cassius persuades him to participate in his plot to assassinate Caesar but they have both sorely underestimated Mark Antony.

name: The Admiral: Roaring Currents
summary_text: Admiral Yi Sun-sin faces a tough challenge when he is forced to defend his nation with just 13 battleships against 300 Japanese enemy ships in the Battle of Myeongryang.

name: Feeling Minnesota
summary_text: An ex-convict and his bumbling crook brother fight for the same woman.

name: Land and Freedom
summary_text: David is an unemployed communist that comes to Spain in 1937 during the civil war to enroll the republicans and defend the democracy against the fascists. He makes friends between the soldiers.

name: It's a Disaster
summary_text: Four couples meet for Sunday brunch only to discover they are stuck in a house together as the world may be about to end.

name: Ittefaq
summary_text: A detective seeks out the truth between two different stories of a crime scene.

name: Shall We Dance?
summary_text: A successful but unhappy Japanese accountant finds the missing passion in his life when he begins to secretly take ballroom dance lessons.

name: First Kill
summary_text: A Wall Street broker is forced to evade a police chief investigating a bank robbery as he attempts to recover the stolen money in exchange for his son's life.

name: The Final
summary_text: A group of high school outcasts get revenge on the students that torment them.

name: The Method
summary_text: 7 Spanish top corporate job candidates are left in a room and informed on computer screens about their tasks and that one of them is an observer. Let the psyching begin.

name: The Brothers Solomon
summary_text: A pair of well-meaning, but socially inept brothers try to find their perfect mates in order to provide their dying father with a grandchild.

name: Hell House LLC
summary_text: Five years after an unexplained malfunction causes the death of 15 tour-goers and staff on the opening night of a Halloween haunted house tour, a documentary crew travels back to the scene of the tragedy to find out what really happened.

name: Peter's Friends
summary_text: Six former college friends, with two new friends, gather for a New Year's Eve weekend reunion at a large English countryside manor after ten years to reminisce about the good times now long gone.

name: Velayudham
summary_text: After a villager unwittingly prevents a number of terrorist attacks in Chennai, a young journalist identifies and persuades him to take on the disguise of a superhero to fight terrorism and corruption.

name: Holidays
summary_text: 'Holidays' is an anthology feature film that puts a uniquely dark and original spin on some of the most iconic and beloved holidays of all time by challenging our folklore, traditions and assumptions.

name: Red Dot
summary_text: When Nadja becomes pregnant, they make an attempt to rekindle their relationship by traveling to the north of Sweden for a hiking trip but soon their romantic trip turns into a nightmare.

name: Bachna Ae Haseeno
summary_text: Raj is a heartbreaker. His love stories with Mahi, Radhika and Gayatri finally teach him about love and life in their own sweet, sexy and sassy way.

name: Unaccompanied Minors
summary_text: A group of unaccompanied minors bond while snowed in at the midwestern Hoover International Airport during the holiday season and ultimately create a makeshift holiday themselves.

name: Hobgoblins
summary_text: A young security guard must track down diminutive aliens who kill people even as they make their fantasies come true.

name: System Crasher
summary_text: On her wild quest for love, 9-year-old Benni's untamed energy drives everyone around her to despair.

name: The Caller
summary_text: A young divorcee is getting her life back together by moving into an apartment. But what will she do when a strange person repeatedly calls her, and threatens to change her new life around?

name: The Hunchback of Notre Dame
summary_text: In 15th-century France, a gypsy girl is framed for murder by the infatuated Chief Justice, and only the deformed bellringer of Notre Dame Cathedral can save her.

name: The Notorious Bettie Page
summary_text: The life of Bettie Page, a 1950s pin-up model and one of the first sex icons in America, who became the target of a Senate investigation because of her risqué bondage photos.

name: Chapter 27
summary_text: A film about Mark David Chapman in the days leading up to the infamous murder of Beatle John Lennon.

name: The Servant
summary_text: Upper-class Tony hires servant Hugo Barrett, who turns out to have a hidden agenda.

name: Paradise Hills
summary_text: Uma is a young woman who wakes up in an apparently idyllic reform school for young ladies. But a dark secret lies within its walls.

name: Megan Is Missing
summary_text: Two teenage girls encounter an Internet child predator.

name: Queen of the Desert
summary_text: A chronicle of Gertrude Bell's life, a traveler, writer, archaeologist, explorer, cartographer, and political attaché for the British Empire at the dawn of the twentieth century.

name: Hannah Gadsby: Nanette
summary_text: Australian comic Hannah Gadsby reshapes standard stand-up by pairing punchlines with personal revelations on gender, sexuality and childhood turmoil.

name: Home of the Brave
summary_text: Three soldiers struggle to readjust to life at home after returning home from a lengthy tour in Iraq.

name: The Canyons
summary_text: When Christian, an LA trust-fund kid with casual ties to Hollywood, learns of a secret affair between Tara and the lead of his film project, Ryan, he spirals out of control, and his cruel mind games escalate into an act of bloody violence.

name: The Muse
summary_text: With his career on the skids, a Hollywood screenwriter enlists the aid of a modern-day muse, who proves to test his patience.

name: Amityville II: The Possession
summary_text: A dysfunctional family moves into a new house, which proves to be satanic, resulting in the demonic possession of their teenage son.

name: Mr. Blandings Builds His Dream House
summary_text: A man and his wife decide they can afford to have a house in the country built to their specifications. It's a lot more trouble than they think.

name: The Dark
summary_text: In mourning over the tragic drowning of their daughter Sarah, James and Adèle are visited by Ebrill, a young girl who claims she died 60 years ago - and bears a startling resemblance to Sarah.

name: Soul Men
summary_text: Though it's been about twenty years since they have spoken with one another, two estranged soul-singing legends agree to participate in a reunion performance at the Apollo Theater to honor their recently deceased band leader.

name: Necessary Roughness
summary_text: Due to NCAA sanctions, the Texas State University Fightin' Armadillos must form a football team from their actual student body, with no scholarships to help, to play their football schedule.

name: Fear and Desire
summary_text: Four soldiers trapped behind enemy lines must confront their fears and desires.

name: Wonder Park
summary_text: Wonder Park tells the story of an amusement park where the imagination of a wildly creative girl named June comes alive.

name: Viva Zapata!
summary_text: The story of Mexican revolutionary Emiliano Zapata, who led a rebellion against the corrupt, oppressive dictatorship of president Porfirio Díaz in the early 20th century.

name: Twixt
summary_text: A struggling horror writer visiting a small town on a book tour gets caught up in a murder mystery involving a young girl. That night in a dream, he is approached by a mysterious young ghost named V.

name: Lottery Ticket
summary_text: Kevin Carson is a young man living in the projects who has to survive a three-day weekend after his opportunistic neighbors find out he's holding a winning lottery ticket worth $370 million.

name: The Newton Boys
summary_text: The story of the Newton gang, the most successful bank robbers in history, owing to their good planning and minimal violence.

name: Jigarthanda
summary_text: An aspiring director targets a ruthless gangster because he wants to make a violent gangster film. His discreet attempts to research the gangster fail miserably. Finally when he gets caught snooping, things hit the fan.

name: A Single Shot
summary_text: The tragic death of a beautiful young girl starts a tense and atmospheric game of cat and mouse between hunter John Moon and the hardened backwater criminals out for his blood.

name: Saving Face
summary_text: A Chinese-American lesbian and her traditionalist mother are reluctant to go public with secret loves that clash against cultural expectations.

name: Stuart: A Life Backwards
summary_text: A writer takes a backwards look at the life of his unlikely friend Stuart, a homeless alcoholic who experienced a traumatic event in his childhood.

name: Diary of a Nymphomaniac
summary_text: A chronicle of the life of a middle-class French girl's sexual adventures, her then fall into prostitution, and her ultimate redemption.

name: Auntie Mame
summary_text: An orphan goes to live with his free-spirited aunt. Conflict ensues when the executor of his father's estate objects to the aunt's lifestyle.

name: Written on the Wind
summary_text: Alcoholic playboy Kyle Hadley marries the woman secretly loved by his poor but hard-working best friend, who in turn is pursued by Kyle's nymphomaniac sister.

name: Karakter
summary_text: Jacob Katadreuffe lives mute with his mother, has no contact with his father who only works against him and wants to become a lawyer, at all costs.

name: Blancanieves
summary_text: A twist on the Snow White fairy tale that is set in 1920s Seville and centered on a female bullfighter.

name: Destry Rides Again
summary_text: Deputy sheriff Destry tames the town of Bottle Neck, including saloon singer Frenchy.
